message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering our product! We're excited to discuss the details with you.
Alice, I appreciate your offer but I'm looking to pay a bit less. I'd be willing to pay $1100000 for the product. Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. We appreciate your interest in our product. After careful consideration, we're willing to meet you halfway. We're offering a counteroffer of 1200000 for the product.
